citations.narrative:
Acquisition records were unavailable for all of the mammals present during this inspection. Records of acquisition are
necessary to ensure that animals are appropriately obtained. Dealers shall make, keep and maintain records or forms
which fully and correctly disclose information such as name and address of the person from whom the animals were
purchased or otherwise acquired.
TO BE CORRECTED BY: NOVEMBER 23, 2021
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.75(b)(1)(i) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
Acquisition records were unavailable for all of the mammals present during this inspection.  Records of acquisition are 
necessary to ensure that animals are appropriately obtained.  Dealers shall make, keep and maintain records or forms 
which fully and correctly disclose information such as name and address of the person from whom the animals were 
purchased or otherwise acquired. 
 
TO BE CORRECTED BY:  NOVEMBER 23, 2021 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
